thread.section_title: Comfort Inn Manhattan Bridge - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (New York City) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Great choice for money and location
thread.title_full: Great choice for money and location - Review of Comfort Inn Manhattan Bridge, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: kinghard
title: Great choice for money and location
text: Centrally located next to china town.short journeys to city centre.brooklyn and the hip delancey district.great views of the bridge from the roof terrace.nice rooms with comfy bed and pillows.big tv and tea/coffee.breakfast is good with plenty of choice on cold items.hot breakfast is limited.small but afequate fitness centre.very friendly staff.
